Subskills.name: Earth Shaker
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by shockwave.

Subskills.name: Trembling Trail
Subskills.description: Smash the ground in front of you creating a shockwave that travels a short distance and then splits into all directions.

Subskills.name: Ground Fissure
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to knockup monsters dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Shocking Crust
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt by shockwave.

Subskills.name: Multi Trail
Subskills.description: Adds an additional trail but decreases damage dealt by each shockwave.

Subskills.name: Cracked Earth
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict armor break on hit.

Subskills.name: Meteorology
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to drop a meteor on the target dealing additional damage.

Subskills.name: Earthen Maelstrom
Subskills.description: Shockwaves twirl outwards around you dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Duck and Cover
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Afterquake
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional shockwave.

Subskills.name: Land Mass
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of shockwave.

Subskills.name: Cataclysmic Smash
Subskills.description: Smashing the ground now creates shockwaves in every direction. Shockwave now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Forking Crust
Subskills.description: Each wave has a chance to fork into a new trail.
